Description:
Open By Private Inspection - Where Quality And Quantity Combine!
Zed Real Estate is cooperating and responding to the Governments restrictions to the Real Estate market in relation to the Covid-19 outbreak by complying with the governments decision to cancel all public open for inspections and auctions and only conducting private viewings for properties.
Our team will follow the advised social distancing regulation put in place of 1.5 meters and will have hand gloves and sanitizing products for use for both ourselves and our clients. We would like to thank you for your understanding during these unprecedented times.
Enjoying the peace and privacy of a generous 777m2 allotment, on one of prestigious Craigieburns finest streets, this stunning family home showcases panoramic city views, bespoke designer style, lavish proportions and the finest of finishes, all combining to deliver a lifestyle of contemporary luxury.
Entered via an enticing boardwalk through easy-care landscaped gardens, you are ushered into a two-storey interior that introduces elegance, sophistication, and a brilliant sense of space accentuated by high ceilings, solid Tasman Oak floors, Quality carpets newly installed and the finest quality European tiles used throughout. The banks of full height windows allow plenty of natural light into the home but also feature block out blinds with e-screens.
Enhanced by hard-wearing, good-looking, glossy timber floors, the expansive lounge dining on the entry level is complemented by a generous open plan living-meals. Anchored by a wood heater coonara and wrapping around the kitchen, walls of bi-folds peel back to deliver seamless access to alfresco spaces perfect for relaxed entertaining. Lunch will easily morph into dinner against a backdrop of the city thats enthralling by day, enchanting by night.
The chefs kitchen hosts the finest appointments. From custom-designed and built cabinetry showcasing quality SMEG appliances complemented by a sleek glass splashback, an abundance of storage options, to a very handy island bench, perfect for everyday meals, it looks as good as it cooks!
The entry-level is also host to the first of five bedrooms. Adjacent to the powder room, it would be ideal for guests or work very well and a home office if desired.
A showpiece statement staircase invites you upstairs where you'll discover the main suite with retreat space, spa ensuite (floor to ceiling tiles), dressing room and an outlook to the city, and three further bedrooms served by a designer detailed family bathroom.
Cleverly integrated under the house and accessed from both Excelsior Heights and Scenic Terrace is garaging for three cars and a large workshop and storage space.
Additional security benefits include: Security Alarm, Australian safety standard hand-railing with lockable gates on all balconies and crime safe security doors.
Merely minutes from parkland, sports grounds, public transport, shops and schools, desired extras include double roller blinds, quality carpet complementing timber floors, substantial fitted laundry, ducted heating, and cooling and multiple split system units ensure exceptional living in an elite location!
Insights: 37 Excelsior Heights, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Location..Quality.. Affordability
Nestled in the best pocket of Craigieburn in a friendly, quite, family neighbourhood within short distance to Schools, Parks, Public Transport and Shopping Centres.
This charming home has got everything to offer, including three good size bedrooms, master with stylish ensuite and built-in robe, remaining rooms also with built-in robes. A formal lounge and an open plan family living/dining area comprising of a fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard space. This area also allows outdoor access to the backyard, generous in space and featuring a great size decking-Perfect for entertaining family and friends!
Enjoy a good size laundry, a stylish central bathroom and a separate toilet plus a single car garage with access to
the home and backyard!
Other features include: stone bench tops to kitchen, bathroom and launderette, high ceilings, downlights, dishwasher, range hood, stainless steel appliances, gas stove and oven, gas hot water service, ducted heating, cooling system, remote controlled garage door, floor boards, carpet, and tiles to the wet areas.
Whether you're buying to live in or looking for an investment, this great opportunity is one not to be missed!
Call Chawki Mallouk today on 0413 370 414 to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Brilliant Family Home in Most Desirable Location
Picturesque, light filled and designed for modern day living, this much loved 5 bedrooms family home plus a study will impress even the fussiest of buyers. Built to the highest of standards, this masterpiece spares no expense and with a custom designed layout giving enough room for a growing family.
You will love this immaculately presented home for
Multiple living areas includes formal lounge, family and dining arena
King size master suite with luxury ensuite and walk in robes
Other 3 large bedrooms well serviced by luxurious central bathroom.
Stunning gourmet kitchen offers plenty of bench & cupboard space includes large walk in pantry, top of the range 900 mm cooktops and dishwasher.
Evaporative cooling & ducted heating.
Quality features such as high ceilings maximising the natural light, quality furnishings, floorboards throughout etc.
Spacious outdoor arena with well-maintained backyard. Let your kids or pets run in the safety of their own backyard.
Remote operated double car garage with extra storage space.
The inclusions list is even better, remote operated double garage, security alarm system, concreted backyard and a low maintenance front and backyard plus so much more.
Only a short stroll to Craigieburn Station, Hume tennis court, Aitkin creek primary, Hume library, Splash aquatic centre, Craigieburn central shopping and a short drive to Hume Anglican Grammar, and very easy access to Hume freeway.
An inspection is a must to fully appreciate the quality of this outstanding luxury home and will truly impress. Call now.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Exquisite Style With A Location To Match!
Located in one of Craigieburn's premier estates , this superbly presented home offers spacious family living close to popular schools and shops. The interior boasts dual living zones, open plan kitchen and dining and spacious bedrooms including a master with ensuite and walk in robe.
Comprising of ducted heating & split system cooling, kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/family area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite featuring double vanity, floating floor boards, quality window furnishings, upstairs rumpus, alarm system, remote control single lock up garage with internal access plus much more.
Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with low maintenance landscaped gardens.
Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland, with all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Sensational New Style with Every Aston Advantage
Exceptional modern living, this just-completed home showcases 2 levels of luxury & light providing a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle opportunity in a sought-after Aston neighbourhood.
The feature-packed 25sq* interior boasts 4 bedrooms, 2 master suites with one conveniently placed downstairs, both featuring WIR's and luxurious ensuites, stylish main bathroom & 2 separate powder rooms- one on each level. Add to this, dual living zones, a spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a classy stone-topped kitchen with soft- close cabinetry, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample storage space.
Other highlights include, zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, floor-to-ceiling tiles in all bathrooms and powder rooms, 4 toilets, stone benchtops throughout (including the laundry), plus low maintenance surrounds, courtyard with synthetic turf & a remote-control double garage.
This remarkable property also enjoys close proximity to the area's renowned schools, a short stroll to a beautiful park and bus stop, minutes away from Craigieburn Central, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Road & Mickleham Road. Simply move in & start living!

Description:
MORE LIKE A DOUBLE STOREY HOUSE THAN A TOWNHOUSE!
This Victorian inspired terrace home has something special to offer a first home buyer, downsizer or investor who's looking to feel secure and safe in a quiet local with an enjoyable low maintenance lifestyle.
The extra-spacious layout flows fluently throughout the home, upstairs offers good sized bedrooms with walk in robe, master with ensuite and balcony that overlooks parklands. The light-filled ground level continues with an organized kitchen which looks onto the decked alfresco and spacious backyard, while there's a powder room, separate laundry, fitted storage and remote-control double carport.
A perfect blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort.
Other features include no body corporate, ducted heating, ceiling fans, garden shed, security doors and Holland blinds make this home all the more appealing
When attending the open for inspection please enter via the rear entrance
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Walk To Craigieburn Central
With its spacious floorplan, designer flair & unbeatable location, this two-storey home delivers a lifestyle of low-maintenance luxury with immediate access to the best that Craigieburn has to offer.
This beautiful home showcases an abundance of natural light that includes an open plan meals/living area with a brilliantly well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances & stone bench tops, upstairs study. There are 3 well-proportioned bedrooms, master bedroom with robe & ensuite with your very own balcony and a modern central bathroom.
Flowing effortlessly out back is a GENEROUSLY sized low maintenance backyard perfect for entertaining. Quality features include 3x split system heating & cooling, alarm system, high ceilings and double remote control garage. This gorgeous home will simply leave a smile on your face, all you have to do is move in and enjoy!

Description:
Irresistible Potential
The well-maintained garden and neatly cut front lawn immediately signal that this is a much loved family home, which is likely to be the same for the next generation of owners.
Situated on a generous allotment of approx. 658m2, with plenty
of scope to either keep the house and build a unit out the back(STCA) or simply build 3 brand new units (STCA)....there is SO much to work with.
The home comprises of 3 generous size bedrooms, all with built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom. The amazing floorplan includes a renovated open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, ample cupboard space, a living/meals area and a generous size open living.
Extras include: a generous size double garage which could also be used as a work shop , 2 car space carport, heating, cooling, an undercover entertainment area and much, much more.
Do not miss out on this amazing opportunity!
Sealed Bid: 13/7/2020 Monday 7;00pm *Unless sold prior*

Description:
THE BEST PIECE OF REAL ESTATE IN THE HEART OF CRAIGIEBURN LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION
Sitting on a HUGE CORNER BLOCK of land 670m2 (approximately) this property provides endless opportunities. Builders, developers and investors take a close look at this magnificent opportunity with the potential to redevelop into a multi-unit site (subject to council approval) or utilize its prime position for your commercial uses such as an office, clinic or consulting rooms also subject to council approval. Only a stone throw away from Craigieburn Plaza, public transport, local schools and leisure facilities. Providing excellent exposure and convenience, this opportunity is not to be missed. Not often can a home be found offering so much.
Currently leased out for $1434 per calendar month.

Description:
SPACIOUS TOWNHOUSE ACROSS FROM CRAIGIEBURN CENTRAL
INVESTORS AND FIRST HOME BUYERS ALERT !!!!
Looking for position, an investment or modern living then this property is for you!
In a fantastic location with easy access to all major amenities directly across the road to Craigieburn Central and Splash Aquatic Centre, public transport and so much. This immaculately presented and well maintained townhouse ideally suited first homes owners, anyone downsizing and investors alike.
With modern contemporary styling throughout this fantastic property features spacious living zone, three big bedrooms, kitchen meals & living area all separate.
Features and fixtures include :
Stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, ample bench and cupboard space, heating and cooling, no maintenance , single lock up garage and spacious courtyard. Currently leased for $1,781 Per Calendar.

Description:
Quiet Central Location
Be sure to make your start in the home ownership race with this fabulous 3 bedroom home boasting all the attributes sought after by those seeking a single level downsize or an investment property without compromise.
Beautifully maintained the open floor plan offers a spacious family room, adjoining meals area and practical kitchen appointed with a breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances.
Central heating and air conditioning in the living zone offers superior comfort while a remote controlled garage with internal access provides security and peace of mind.
This home offers a convenient lifestyle with a full range of amenities all within easy reach including Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare and Highlands Shopping Centre.
Current tenancy 6th September 2020 at $1473 per calendar month.

Description:
I wont be around for long!
Blocks like these dont come around too often! Set in a great location on one of Craigieburns most popular Estate. This eye-catching 508m2 approx block is within walking distance to numerous primary and high schools, milk bars, public transport, Craigieburn Central. Let the kids go out and have fun at a beautifully designed park meters away, while you take in what Craigieburn has to offer. This parcel of land will make for the perfect new home site.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
A Great Family Home
This home is designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. This magnificent home boasting four large bedrooms with the master comprising of a WIR and ensuite, theatre room, spacious living area and a great kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, plumbing point for fridge, ceasar stone island bench top & butler's pantry. Other features include ducted heating, floating floorboards, double remote garage with internal and external access, fencing and front landscaping.
Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including Newbury Primary school, Aitken Creek Primary School, child care facility, and other local amenities be quick to inspect ! As this one won't hang around for long!
PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATIVE PURPOSES ONLY
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Brand New Living with Family Credentials
If you need plenty of space for the family, this fantastic newly built home is certainly one to take into consideration. With its instant street appeal, a perfect floor plan & on a great family-sized allotment of 392m2, this amazing Metricon home will accommodate all your family's needs.
A sun-drenched living area that features a stone benchtop kitchen with a walk-in pantry overlooking an open plan dining & family room is only the beginning of what this home has to offer. A large private master bedroom, with ensuite & walk-in-robe, is separated completely from the other 3 bedrooms ensuring plenty of parental privacy with the added bonus of a front living room & sparkling bathroom equating to a great family home.
Loaded with quality extras including a double remote garage with internal access, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar gas boosted hot water service, LED downlights to entry & living areas, letterbox, clothesline, alarm & professionally landscaped gardens all around.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Sizable Living, Desirable Location.
Without question one of Craigieburn's most exciting homes, designed & built by Henley, be amazed by this wonderful family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character & class & is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses.
Nestled in an elite location on a whisper quiet tree-lined setting, within walking distance to the beautiful Perisher Reserve, Mt, Ridley College, Hume Anglican Grammar, Highlands Shopping, bus stop & spread out on a fantastic allotment of approx 448m2, this sensational home will no doubt be the envy of all family & friends forever!
Comprising 4 bedrooms, master with walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite, 3 living zones including formal lounge, large meals/family zone and should you feel up for a quiet night indoors, a theatre room to top it all off! The heart of the home enjoys a striking stone-top kitchen, fully equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, and walk-in butlers pantry. The kitchen is truly sublime!
Step outside, fire up the BBQ under your wonderful pergola setting & be amazed by the generous proportions that the private paradise provides which effortlessly meets up with the home to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Truly the perfect haven for the all seasons entertainer & for kids to run around in complete privacy.
Extras include, double remote garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, cozy gas log fireplace and much more!
Perched up high with its commanding street presence & located to absolute perfection are words rarely strung together in a sentence about a home, but this property is all that & more!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
SOLD BY VIJETH SHETTY 0432 407 840 & KALLEY SINGH 0433 927 573 for $460,000
Build your dream house on 604 sqm with 19 metre frontage
Nestled amongst some of the area's finest properties & measuring a whopping 604m2 (approx) with its commanding stance and super-wide 19m frontage, providing immense building options for the lucky buyer.
This home site is the perfect position to build a distinguished home that will have some of the best views to the Melbourne that you will ever see. Situated close to Craigieburn Central, Hume Highway, Craigieburn Public Golf Course, and other important amenities, this large parcel of land will suit all house types. With a limited number of blocks in this prestigious estate available, now is the time to capitalize on this wonderful opportunity.
Comprising of the following:
Frontage: 19m
Depth: 32m
Total Land Area: 604m2 (approx)
Deposit: 5% or 10% is acceptable.
Enjoy all the nearby amenities such as schools, parkland, reserves. This is only the beginning of what is set to come in the developing Craigieburn Area.
To secure this great opportunity with lots of potentials, Contact: VIJETH SHETTY 0432407840.

Description:
Humble Abode in Premier Location- 650m2!
First time offered for sale, much loved and cherished over the years & impeccably presented, this proud brick veneer beauty lends itself perfectly to all home buyers & investors alike.
Positioned to please, smack bang in the heart of Craigieburn within seconds to Willmott Park Primary School, Craigieburn Central & public transport, this wonderful residence is the perfect choice for all home buyers & investors alike. It's neat, tidy & has had all the hard work done for you to just simply move in & enjoy!
Conveniently tucked away in a whisper quiet court, enter a flexible floorplan which comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with ample storage and ceiling fans, sparkling central bathroom & separate toilet, central living room, updated hostess kitchen with stainless steel appliances & an adjoining bright meals area spilling out to a wonderful pergola equipped with cafe blinds - perfect for the all seasons entertainer.
Features include, ducted heating, refrigerative cooling, 6x CCTV cameras, ample off street parking, double carport, tradespersons double garage, private rear yard with lush green grass & on this on a whopping 650m2 (approx) of prime Craigieburn real estate.
Immaculate from entry to end! Get in fast as an opportunity like this, will simply not last!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Lavish parkside luxury
Beautifully balanced over two levels of luxury, this ultra-modern 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home offers low-maintenance luxury with high-impact results!
Discover a chef-friendly kitchen with a breakfast bar, spacious open-plan living and dining, and a perfectly paved patio and yard, ideal for outdoor entertaining.
Architect-designed, enjoy a private balcony with stunning views sweeping over lush parkland, and a remote-controlled garage featuring internal access.
3 large bedrooms, 2 with mirrored BIR, main with stunning ensuite and walk-in robes
Sparkling principal bathroom with bath and separate walk-in shower
Large laundry
Handy ground-floor powder room
Ducted heating and cooling plus vertical blinds
The Highlands Estate address sells itself with quality schools, wide open greenery, bus transport, and Highlands Shopping Centre all an easy stroll away.
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
What a Location, What an Opportunity!
An opportunity not to be missed with this prime 437m2 (approx.) flat block of land on offer to you.
This block is close proximity to transport, schools and Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
With everything Craigieburn has to offer already, future planning is in place for more amenities such as schools, shops and facilities.
Surrounded by beautiful parklands and an amazing family friendly community this is definitely a place you would feel proud to call home.
Call us today!

Shikha Vaid 0414 689 144

Description:
CALLING ALL STARTERS AND INVESTORS
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. This single level Craigieburn unit is light and inviting, offering the easiest low maintenance opportunity you'll find.
With natural light throughout and an unbeatable convenient location, the floor plan begin with a generous size family living and dining area. There are also 3 great size bedrooms with a central bathroom.
Ideally located right in the heart of Craigieburn within close distance to Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, school and shops. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection....
